product_name: Beekman 1802Dewy Eyed Illuminating & Depuffing Eye Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackSay goodbye to fatigue and awaken tired eyes with the Beekman 1802 highly concentrated, clinically proven eye serum. The Dewy Eyed Illuminating & Depuffing Eye Serum's powerful blend of actives and goat milk quickly absorbs into skin for hydrating revitalization.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly cools and awakens dull skinFights dark circles and depuffsLifts and smooths fine lines and wrinklesDewy Eyed is certified microbiome-friendlyLab testedSafe for sensitive skinAllergy testedNon-irritatingFeaturesSignificant improvement in depuffing the under-eye area and reducing the appearance of dark circlesSignificantly firmer skin around the eyes for more lifted lids96% saw significantly smoother skin96% saw significantly nourished skinKey IngredientsPersian Silk Tree Bark Extract: tightens skin and fights dark circles and puffiness, lifting the lids.Goat Milk & Probiotics: This proprietary blend of goat milk and probiotics deeply nourish and balance for healthy, dewy, radiant complexion. It's like yogurt for your sensitive skin!Active Botanical Blend: comfrey, blue thistle, chamomile, cucumber, and aloe are packed full of antioxidants to protect skin's moisture barrier.Item 2569241How To UseApply pea-sized amount under your eyes, around orbital bones, and on eyelids every morning and evening to look and feel refreshed.Extra Credit: Use their ''Milk Drop'' technique by pumping a drop of serum on each of your ring fingers and patting them lightly under the eye, working from the inner eye outward; it should feel like a sprinkle of tiny milk drops under your eyes. Try it-we dairy you.Routine: Use right after cleansing skin, and before applying moisturizer and SPF. Try mixing with the Bloom Cream to create a hydrating under-eye mask.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Propanediol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Colostrum, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Lactose, Milk Protein, Sodium Hyaluronate, Darutoside, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Eryngium Alpinum (Blue Thistle) Flower Extract, Albizia Julibrissin (Silk Tree) Bark Extract, Honey, Linum Usitatissimum (Flax) Seed Extract, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract, Whey Protein, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Citric Acid, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Lecithin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate...and kindnessShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply pea-sized amount under your eyes, around orbital bones, and on eyelids every morning and evening to look and feel refreshed.Extra Credit: Use their ''Milk Drop'' technique by pumping a drop of serum on each of your ring fingers and patting them lightly under the eye, working from the inner eye outward; it should feel like a sprinkle of tiny milk drops under your eyes. Try it-we dairy you.Routine: Use right after cleansing skin, and before applying moisturizer and SPF. Try mixing with the Bloom Cream to create a hydrating under-eye mask.

reviews.headline: Has an ingredient that causes burning and redness
reviews.comments: I never react to most products, my skin is extremely forgiving usually, but the first time I used this my eyes burned and caused my undereyes to be so red I worried it wouldn't go away. I tried it once more and it did the same thing. Not a good product.

reviews.headline: Beekman Eye Serum
reviews.comments: So far great reaction.

reviews.headline: Itchy
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. My eye are constantly puffy and have dark circles. I tried this a couple of times, but it always made my eyes itchy.

reviews.headline: finally. something for my eyes
reviews.comments: long-time sufferer of puffy eyes with darkness. nothing was working but i put just a little bit on my undereyes, eyelids, and around my orbital bone (per instructed) with my ring finger and i get a little more beautiful and a little less beastly. of course theres always only so much any topical treatment can do, but there has been positive results so far!

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL - MUST HAVE
reviews.comments: I love this entire line! I use this on my under eye and eyelid and never have any irritation. My skin is brighter, less puffy, and overall more youthful in appearance. This is a new staple in my routine.

reviews.headline: Did not work for me...
reviews.comments: I got this product due to an in-store-assistant recommendation since she would speak wonders about this product and how it would help reduce puffiness, I've been using it for over 6 months and have noticed NOTHING but some hydration. Definitely not buying this again.

reviews.headline: Pills under makeup
reviews.comments: So good for my sensitive skin, but unfortunately pills under makeup and even under an oil or moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Perfect for Sensitive Eyes
reviews.comments: Thrilled to find this eye serum - depuffs, smooths eye skin, firms, hydrates, cools and doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. It's super concetrated and completely covers both eyes with a single pump.

reviews.headline: not moisturizing, pills
reviews.comments:
I got a travel size of this to try out something new.

I could not believe how bad it looked alone undrt concealer, and when I tried to layer it with other staples like Kiehl's avocado eye cream or lancome génifique yeux there was so much pilling I had to take everything off and start over.

reviews.headline: Made my eyes super red and burn.
reviews.comments:
I used this product one time and my face started to feel like it was burning. 
I went to go look in the mirror and my under eyes and eyelids were bright red and slightly started to swell. 
I took it off with water and put some argan oil on it and it began to calm down. Very scary experience! Never happened to me before.

reviews.headline: Has helped my dark circles
reviews.comments: I've been using this pretty consistently  for the last month, and it's definitely helped me look more awake. Dark circles/bags run in my family, and so far this is the only thing that has helped at all. I have an oily eye area, so I only use this in the morning with my eye cream, go through morning coffee/breakfast routine, then blot before applying makeup, but even then, it still has helped!

reviews.headline: Smells like wet dog or fish
reviews.comments: Listen to the one star reviews. This product has just irritated my eye area leaving the skin around my eye dry and scaly feeling, I had to drench my eye area in vaseline to save my skin, on top of not using it for awhile, it developed this smell, like an actual fish out of water wet dog fur smell…

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: This doesn't appear to be as good as Lancome's eye  cream

reviews.headline: Caused a reaction and smells horrible
reviews.comments:
I don't consider myself to have sensitive skin and I've never had an issues with products however after I used this, the skin under and around my eyes turned red and slightly inflamed. I looked sickly to the point where I almost went to the doctor because this had never happened to me. 

It's been several days and the skin around my eyes finally got super dry and is starting to flake off. Horrible. I do not recommend. Also the product has a horrible wet dog smell.

Takes a lot for me to write a review but I feel like people need to hear this.

reviews.headline: Caused Reaction after One Use
reviews.comments: I used this once and my eyes turned red all around where I used the product. Not sure what ingredient is to blame but I am bummed.

reviews.headline: Caused rashes under my eyes
reviews.comments: Beware if you have even remotely sensitive skin. I normally dont have reactions to products and this made my skin burn, itch, and flake. It took almost a week to clear up. This product went in the trash.

reviews.headline: Caused redness around orbital area
reviews.comments: First time using this product and it caused redness on the areas i used it. My skin looks very red and felt warm

reviews.headline: Love it but…
reviews.comments: Its a very small amount for the price. I haven't noticed that it's done anything to change my eyes as far as bags or circles, but it definitely feels amazing when you put it on and is very moisturizing. I've been using it for a month and wish that there were more positive results. Otherwise they cannot justify spending that amount again on such a small container.

reviews.headline: Not recommend
reviews.comments: I should of listen to the reviews but i always like to give products a try. Not everyones skin is the same however i did too experienced redness and swelling from tbis product. It took me several uses go determine it was this causing redness in my face

reviews.headline: Burning itchy eyes
reviews.comments: I have a very sensitive eye area & although I love other Beekman products, this one left my eyes burning, itchy, & puffy. Would not recommend. The product is also not the most hydrating whether you are sensitive to the formula or not.

media.headline: Burned the skin around my eyes
Wanted to like it, but…….
media.caption: I did put a filter to make the red areas pop out so you can see exactly we're i was talking about

I would not buy this product

media.headline: DO NOT BUY THIS
media.caption: This picture is 5 minutes after applying the serum

media.headline: Dewy Eyed Illuminating & Depuffing Eye Serum
Dewy Eyed Illuminating & Depuffing Eye Serum
This makes me look like I have slept!!
lovely
media.caption: Beekman1802 Dewy Eyed Illuminating & Depuffing Eye Serum is a special blend of silk tree extract, goat milk, and powerful botanical extracts quickly absorbs into skin for age-defying revitalization that illuminates eyes while helping to fight the appearance of puffiness and dark circles.    I really like that I only needed a little bit for each eye (just a dab), and it glides smoothly without leaving me feeling greasy or heavy. It doesn't cake up under makeup, and it doesn't irritate my skin. I discovered that my eyes were thirsty, and this was just what they needed. You can use this in the morning or at night (or both) after cleansing and toning. I felt like my eyes looked more rested after having used this nightly for 2+ weeks, and people were noticing!

media.headline: Best eye serum yet!!
media.caption: Very light serum that easily absorbs in the skin

faceoff_positive.comments: As always impressed with the packaging and the cute little cloth bag that I am going to use to store earrings in later. So cute! Even better this serum really works for puffy eye's in the morning. I put on and walk away for about five minutes to get some coffee and eye puffy is gone. Best I've ever used so I cannot live without this now. I always have wait for my eye to go down before I put on makeup so this is a must have. It doesn't leave any white residue or anything and it is moisturizing. I also purchased some new Beekman 1802 products through Ulta as well. I'm waiting for my order but I leave reviews at both Ulta and the Mercantile. Wow, Brent and Josh you're just knocking it out of the park. So impressed and I'm happy about the price point. It not so high so I can afford to purchase your products and they work and it's clean beauty. 100 stars!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love, Love, Love

faceoff_negative.comments:
So I got this product in one of my monthly BoxyCharm  boxes was exclaimed to get something like this in my premium box I used it that night before bed felt really good not sticky nice smell to it and lightweight
. 
****(This is we're it go's bad for me.)**** 
 after my second use which is today, Tuesday, June 29th 2021. I used it  the same way I did the first time but this time it gave ma a chemical burn on the upper half of my face,  around  my bottom eye area and eyelids which I instantly felt a tingling  burning feeling  that I didn't want to scratch cause the skin around your eyes are very very delicate,  so I just left it alone for a bit and grabbed a cold damp rag and pressed it on my eyes and cheekbone eye area. When I removed the rag off my face it was bright red ! with a tender tingling feeling to it. My skin is very very sensitive so it's hard to find skincare products that actually work for me,  I'm bummed that this product I was so excited about using and adding it  to my skin care routine failed me. Now, would I recommend this product ? Yes and No I say that cause if you have sensitive skin like I do I'd stay clear from using this I say yes cause it may work for others that don't have sensitive skin so yeah it's really up to you if you want to use it but sensitive  girls  I wouldn't use this
faceoff_negative.headline: Wanted to like it, but…….
